snippet: The move comes in response to slow sales and to deal with a change to an all-new version of the car.
abstract: General Motors will not make gas-electric hybrid Chevrolet Volt for four weeks in June and July due to tepid sales and design change.
lead_paragraph: The move comes in response to slow sales and to deal with a change to an all-new version of the car.

headline.main: G.M. to Suspend Making Chevy Volts for 4 Weeks
headline.print_headline: G.M. to Suspend Making Chevy Volts for 4 Weeks
